cause.description:
The Lupus Foundation of Minnesota provides educational materials;offers a source of hope, strength, empowerment and comfort; and supports research focused on finding the cause of and cure for lupus.
1. Support is needed in raising awareness
2. Together we can find a cure
cause.mission: We serve those affected by lupus, raise awareness and fund research in an ongoing effort to improve the lives of others.
cause.name: Lupus Awareness and Research
